name: Riverlight
description: Channels clear river glow to mend an ally.

name: Tidal Mend
description: A surge of restorative water that tops off grievous wounds.

name: Mist Purge
description: Lashes an enemy with concentrated cleansing mist.

name: Radiant Cleave
description: Holy swing that sears foes with disciplined light.

name: Warding Stance
description: Greyor braces behind his shield, restoring vigor while guarding.

name: Judgment Smite
description: A heavy finishing blow reserved for corrupted foes.

name: Shadow Fang
description: Quick stab that exploits any exposed flank.

name: Bleeding Step
description: A blur of twin blades that leaves the target reeling.

name: Mist Vanish
description: Fades into the haze, recovering while enemies lose track.

name: Aether Flare
description: Launches compressed aether into a focused burst.

name: Time Slip
description: Rewinds an ally's wounds a few heartbeats.

name: Void Lance
description: Pierces armor with a drilling beam of nothingness.

name: Volatile Flask
description: Tosses a caustic brew that detonates on contact.

name: Panacea Cloud
description: A gentle aerosol tonic that restores allies in the mist.

name: Mist Sapper
description: Siphons the enemy's corrupted vapors to weaken them.

name: Talon Shift
description: Momentarily morphs limbs into raking talons.

name: Feral Guard
description: Hardened hide and regenerative focus close wounds mid-fight.

name: Echo Strike
description: Hits twice in rapid succession thanks to mirrored forms.

name: Arrowstorm
description: Rapid shots that keep pressure on encroaching foes.

name: Hunter's Resolve
description: A rallying call that steadies an ally's aim and spirit.

name: Royal Rebuke
description: A precise charged shot reserved for elite threats.
